a_h_d: X-AIFinancehas developed its own powerful AI-based investment trading model, called Takwin. Based on the Takwin model, the X-AIFinanceAI Fund offers four distinct investment strategies, providing investors with access to efficient and scientifically based investment solutions. This approach helps to improve the accuracy of investment decisions and optimize overall management efficiency.
e_a_a: Establishing an AI-driven financial framework with a venture capital model utilizing a 270 billion parameter AI system.
t_t_c: The Takwin computing system continuously optimizes algorithm models by automatically collecting, analyzing, and mining investment market data to develop more accurateventure capital strategies. It provides scientific and efficient trading strategies for the Aifeex AI Fund. Aifeex has invested substantial resources in case studies and data analysis to further validate Takwin's effectiveness in practical applications. In terms of datasets, Takwin has gathered approximately 40 million research papers, over 1 billion financial news articles, and more than 17 billion pieces of data from social networks, trading platforms, and market software—far surpassing the inference capabilities of similar systems. In application, the Takwin computing system can aggregate terabytes of data per minute, achieving 92% accuracy in logic and sentiment analysis, significantly exceeding human accuracy of 77%. Additionally, Takwin can perform real-time parallel processing of quantitative portfolio management for tens of thousands of assets.
